abstract: man battered with hammer in wirral street gang attack .
article: victim suffered a serious head injury in the assault in uptona man was hit over the head with a hammer and a piece of wood in a horrific attack by a group of teenagers in wirral . the 49-year-old was assaulted by the group , believed to be around 17-years-old , after an altercation on greystoke close , upton . the victim suffered a serious head injury and was taken to hospital following the incident at around 7.50 pm on wednesday . he is still being treated for his injuries and is in a stable condition . detective inspector paul parry said : `` this was a nasty attack on a man near his home and while the victim suffered a serious injury to his head , he is very fortunate the injuries were not more serious .
